about_the_game:
"I’ll love you no matter how messed up you are..."


A man has stalked you ever since you were a child. You call him Geist. You're not sure who...or what he is, but he adores you, and he has never left your side. When you befriend a new boy at college, Geist will do anything to keep you in his grasp.

Features


  • 20k words, or around 1.5-2 hours of playtime
  • Full voice acting for both love interests
  • Live 2D-style animated illustrations
  • Customizable name and pronouns for an immersive experience!
  • One sunshine Hawaiian boy
  • One (overly) affectionate British ghost

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card, OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+ (EXCLUDING MacOS 12)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card, OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: MindMindMind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card, OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A dark, psychological romance VN about a British ghost who has haunted you since childhood. When you get close to a new boy at college, he starts to get possessive, and the mind games begin! Voice acted with Live2D-style animated illustrations.
